subsection_name: protein-nieu.json_6_Protein in urine warns of what disease?
subsection_content: Protein appearing in urine is a warning sign of kidney disease risk. The organ, when in a healthy state, filters out all excess fluid and waste from the blood, but does not leak proteins or essential nutrients out. In the opposite case, proteinuria will occur. Depending on the health problem, protein may stay in the urine for a long time or only appear for a short time.
subsection_title: protein nieu.json. Protein in urine warns of what disease?
subsection_data:
protein nieu.json. Protein in urine warns of what disease?
Protein appearing in urine is a warning sign of kidney disease risk. The organ, when in a healthy state, filters out all excess fluid and waste from the blood, but does not leak proteins or essential nutrients out. In the opposite case, proteinuria will occur. Depending on the health problem, protein may stay in the urine for a long time or only appear for a short time.
